'''Let the Desert Bloom''' is a [[Furnishing]] item that can be used in the [[Serenitea Pot]].

It was sent out via in-game mail to all Chinese players through the [[Genshin Impact × Alipay]] collaboration.

It was released globally via the [[Discover Traces, Explore Nature]] web event.
